      • valueForYPosition

        public double valueForYPosition(int yPos)
        Returns a value give a y position. If yPos is past the track at the top or the bottom it will set the value to the min or max of the slider, depending if the slider is inverted or not.
        Specified by:
        valueForYPosition in class MultiThumbSliderUI

      • valueForXPosition

        public double valueForXPosition(int xPos)
        Returns a value given an x position. If xPos is past the track at the left or the right it will set the value to the min or max of the slider, depending if the slider is inverted or not.
        Specified by:
        valueForXPosition in class MultiThumbSliderUI
